title: cryptoaddictchie
author: cryptoaddictchie
content: Everyone Celestia announced their airdrop. Check out the tweet from them.https://twitter.com/CelestiaOrg/status/1706671239572676881?t=cDy-X3wnU5f5NbUTjI372Q&s=19According to the thread they followed up. "Starting today, 7,579 developers and 576,653 onchain addresses will have the opportunity to join Celestia from the first block.Eligible participants can claim up to 60M TIA, the native asset of Celestia, until 17 October 2023, 12:00 UTC." These 60m tokens are comprises of-developers-ethereum rollups active users-cosmos hub and osmosis stakersIve checked my cosmo and one of my active wallet on eth they got some tokens and has eligibility try yours. You could check your wallet without even connecting it here: https://genesis.celestia.org/

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: There's already a thread that was made on the Speculation Altcoins yesterday about this airdrop of Celestia. I think it's better if the discussion continues there. Thread link: (https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5468177.0)

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
